original_text: The more wisdom you have, the more you will worry. The more you learn, the more you suffer. 1: These were probably also proverbs. The more wisdom and knowledge that a person has, the more that person will understand that life has problems. The more wisdom you have, the more you will worry. korean_text: 지혜가 많으면 번뇌도 많으니 지식을 더하는 자는 근심을 더하느니라

sentences.original_text: The more wisdom and knowledge that a person has
the more that person will understand
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 더 많이 이해하게 될 것이다
